title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the NeuralCodeDebugger project. The requirements should include specific details on user interface design (UI/UX), data storage solutions, security measures, performance benchmarks, compatibility with various programming languages and BCI devices, error handling mechanisms, accessibility considerations, and documentation standards. Prioritize these requirements based on their impact and complexity, ensuring that critical functionalities are addressed promptly. Upon completion, create a comprehensive document detailing all project requirements for further reference. It would also be beneficial to include a section on the integration of real-time collaboration features and cross-platform compatibility. Upon review by the code-architect, this RFC will transition to the 'IN_PROGRESS' state.

title: Design Brain-Computer Interface Architecture
description: Create a design for the BCI hardware and software components to interact with code.

title: Develop BCI Hardware Prototype
description: Prototype and test the hardware components required for the NeuralCodeDebugger BCI system.

title: Develop BCI Software Prototype
description: Prototype and test the software components required for the NeuralCodeDebugger BCI system.

title: Develop NeuralCodeDebugger Frontend
description: Create the user interface for programmers to interact with their code using the BCI system.

title: Integrate Hardware and Software Components
description: Combine the hardware and software components to create a functional NeuralCodeDebugger system.

title: Test NeuralCodeDebugger System
description: Perform thorough testing on the NeuralCodeDebugger system to ensure it meets functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Iteratively Refine NeuralCodeDebugger System
description: Address any issues found during testing and improve the system based on user feedback.

title: Document and Publish User Guide
description: Create a comprehensive guide for users to learn how to use the NeuralCodeDebugger system.
